properties.areaDesc: Wyoming Black Hills; Northern Black Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:47AM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW LATE SATURDAY INTO EARLY SUNDAY...

.The next system will move into the area this afternoon, bringing
snowfall later today and tonight. Snow will taper off Sunday
morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches,
with locally higher amounts possible.

* WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Black Hills. In Wyoming,
the Wyoming Black Hills.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY
